author: USA TODAY, Dan Keemahill, Erin Mansfield, Dinah Voyles Pulver, Nicholas Wu, Dian Zhang, USA TODAY
title: Fauci lowers U.S. coronavirus death forecast to 60,000, says social distancing is working
description: Anthony Fauci said Thursday the death toll from the coronavirus could be closer to 60,000 Americans, smaller than previous projections.
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci says we will never be able to act like "there never was a coronavirus problem."
USA TODAY
Senior White House adviser Anthony Fauci said Thursday the death toll from the coronavirus could be closer to 60,000 Americans, assuming full social … [+6690 chars]
